name: Skull Drake
movement: burrow 10 ft., fly 60 ft., walk 40 ft.
description: A Medium-sized Dragon with a mix of strength and agility, characterized by a skull-like head and noxious breath.
memorable: Its Necrotic Breath can instantly kill weakened foes, adding a lethal aspect to its combat style.
goals: Hunt prey, attack intruders, and defend its territory.
relations: Possibly associates with other draconic creatures or undead beings.
environment: Typically found in dark, damp areas or ruins.
strengths: High mobility with flying and burrowing capabilities; strong melee and special attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to radiant damage and disadvantage in sunlight.
attacks: Multiattack option with two bite attacks, dealing significant piercing damage, and a devastating area attack with Necrotic Breath.
most_powerful_ability: Necrotic Breath, which can kill instantly if it drops a creature to 0 hit points.
senses: Keen Smell grants advantage on perception checks related to smell.
skills: Skilled in stealth and perception, allowing it to move quietly and detect hidden threats.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic damage and poisoned condition
Good at evasive maneuvers due to high Dexterity
test_queries: agile dragon with necrotic breath attack
medium dragon that hunts in dark environments
skull-like dragon vulnerable to radiant damage
dragon with strong bite and stealth abilities
